file.title: Paint

p.text: The event is called when the object is completely or partially redrawn. This occurs when the object was hidden under some other object and now becomes visible. Or this can occur after the cursor was moved over the object and then left the object's area and the object is redrawn in order to delete cursorimage.

remarks.textAll: You can force execution of this event by using the following command: Refresh.
